ygData.subject: RE: Group damage - was Revised? Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If more people played on the actual Test server, things like this wouldn t need to be done. However their only option was to test it out on a live server.
ygData.messageBody:
> Did they revise the patch message? It now says the group
> damage getting the exp only has been applied to the Fennin
> Ro server. Those bums! How long have we all been waiting
> for this change? *sigh*

If more people played on the actual Test server, things like
this wouldn't need to be done. However their only option
was to test it out on a live server. Instead of putting in
this change (that might be bugged all to heck) on EVERY
server and upsetting *tens of thousands* of players if it
didn't work, they're doing the very intelligent thing and
keeping the test limited.

People would complain if they put it everywhere and it didn't
work.

People are complaining because they didn't put it everywhere
to test it to make sure it works.

It's true - you can't make all the people happy all the time.
